workshoptitle: Install Oracle Database 21c on OCI Compute

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on Oracle Database 21c Installation.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup Compute Instance
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Install Oracle Database
tutorials.description: How to install Oracle Database 21c for Desktop class (minimal configuration) and Server class (advanced configuration).

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Create Container Database
tutorials.description: How to create a single instance container database with both typical and advanced configuration. It does not install the Oracle Database software.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
